title: Zak Brown denies destroying evidence in McLaren case against Alex Palou
summary: McLaren Racing CEO Zak Brown was accused in court of deleting crucial WhatsApp messages, on his second day of giving evidence in the $20.7m case between his team and IndyCar champion Alex Palou

qa_pairs.question: Who is the CEO of McLaren Racing?
What is the amount involved in the legal case between McLaren and Alex Palou?
Which racing series does Alex Palou compete in?
